product_name: Kurgo Reflect & Protect Quantum Dog Leash
long_description: The versatile Kurgo Reflect & Protect Quantum Dog Leash goes from a 6-foot-long lead to a shoulder or waist leash, to a double dog walker. A reflective strip help provide visibility in low light. By adjusting a simple steel carabiner (included), the Kurgo Quantum Leash easily switches styles depending on your activity. Floating padded handle provides you with comfort and support in every configuration. Configures into an over-the-shoulder fit, 3-ft. lead leash, as well as a waistbelt for running or hiking. Kurgo Reflect & Protect Quantum Dog Leash offers reflectivity to help keep you visible at dawn or dusk.
short_description: The versatile Kurgo Reflect & Protect Quantum Dog Leash goes from a 6-foot-long lead to a shoulder or waist leash, to a double dog walker. A reflective strip help provide visibility in low light.
